title: Among Us Crewmate Figures | 8 Among Us Toys Out of 16 Collectibles in 1 Box | Among Us Merch Incl. The Peeled and The Clogged | 2 Hidden Impostors | Mini Toys with 5 Add‚Äôl Hats
description:
About this item
GET 8 AMONG US FIGURES AT ONCE. These are small toys representing the game‚Äôs characters, including the Peeled, the dead body (report it!), the purple impostor (beware of the tongue!), and two unknown extras! The five additional hats include the Knighted, the Cap-tain, and the Floaty Flamingo‚Äîand they‚Äôre just like in the game! The blister package playfully hides two Among Us toy pieces in it from you‚Äîto remind you that there‚Äôre always impostors among us. Find out who the impostors are this time!
AMONG US GIFTS WITH THE TOTAL OF 16 FOR YOU TO COLLECT. Find all these Among Us toys for boys and girls including the four rarities: the purple Punkin head, the cyan Floaty Flamingo head, the red Chop-chop head, and the lime one wearing the Great Goalie (the Jason mask?)‚Äîand he‚Äôs running! Two of the characters in each deluxe box are hidden impostors whom you can‚Äôt see before you open the pack, so the whole deal with collecting this AmongUs stuff turns into a real quest. Collect them all!
USE THE TOYS AS AMONG US PARTY SUPPLIES. For parents and kids, toys can work as both party d√©cor and entertainment as they bring a mood and a theme to a party and invite children to an activity‚Äîjust play with them! These Among Us toys for kids can inspire them to have an offline match or two of their own and find the impostor. Throw a simple Among Us party or even an Among Us birthday party with this Among Us stuff, and hear your kids happily shout ‚ÄúEmergency Meeting!‚Äù now and then.
GENUINE AMONG US TOYS LICENSED BY THE GAME‚ÄôS DEVELOPERS. P.M.I., the manufacturer of these mini toys, is licensed by InnerSloth, the company that created Among Us. The kids‚Äô toys are authentic-looking and in line with the game‚Äôs original style. Minimalistic as they are, these Among Us party favors show the producer‚Äôs great attention to detail, like the 5 accessories included in the deluxe box. Spark your children‚Äôs interest in the game, or reward them if they‚Äôre already fans.
PERFECT AS AMONG US GIFTS. A whole pack of Among Us merch is a great gift idea, especially if your or your friends‚Äô children have tried out and liked the game. The pack will also come in handy if you‚Äôre looking for simple Among Us birthday party supplies, and it can even be used as Among Us birthday decorations. Get the right pack to help a young enthusiast complete their collection or start one from scratch. Perhaps, an adult AmongUs small toys collector will appreciate the gift, too.

reviews.name: Ssj2 Sanji
reviews.review: I had originally got an Among Us plus from the local Best Buy for one of my kids. My youngest birthday was coming up so I decided to look on  for one. To my big surprise I saw plushes of not only Among Us, but in different characters also. My kid loves Among us and Pok√©mon so this purchase was a no brainer for me! She loves it and I couldn‚Äôt be more satisfied with how fast I received it! I loved it so much that I got my other kid one of Baby Yoda!

reviews.name: MagicMommyB
reviews.review:
An amazing sussy disguise or a legendary evolution, either way it went off as a huge hit with my kids.
My son & daughter went crazy for this plushie. The both love and play several pokemon games daily & are among us gamer fans as well!! They have a 8 year plushie collection and growing and this plushie definitely made the cut. High quality made it is so soft and pretty large in size for most plushies out there. No defects, flaws I would have thought this would have been a higher price limited edition plushie that came from the creators from both gaming companies the design and quality is that good!! 2 for 1 plush high profile characters you just cannot beat that I give it 5 stars and will be purchasing more!!

reviews.name: A.Mom
reviews.review:
From the moment I pulled this plush out of the  box, my 7, 9, & 12yo began fighting over this plush. They were honestly beyond thrilled. An Among Us and Pok√©mon mashup... well that's a combo of their two most favorite things!
I am happy to report this plush was a lot bigger in person than I expected it to be. And it feels really well made too. They're very happy that I found this super sweet merch. I'd come back to buy other mash up plushies from this company, for sure. It was an excellent find!
Hope this review was helpful!

reviews.name: Arzach
reviews.review: Another weird Among Us crossover. I guess they will capitalize on anything, expecting us to lap it up like good little capitalist stooges. We might be outraged if it didn't make us laugh so much! Very sus...

reviews.name: Lee4kids
reviews.review: my seven year old loves this, came vacuum sealed but fluffed right away, great carryable size, soft, good quality and makes a great gift for any child,

reviews.name: Megan H
reviews.review: It does come vacuum sealed in a bag, so it was really wrinkled when I took it out. However, after you toss it in the dryer on gentle for a few minutes, it looked good as new! No weird chemical smells, which was a plus for us since my son has eczema and asthma.

reviews.name: Leeshie
reviews.review: Cute plush toy if you have a child who loves Among Us and Pokemon. It's a decent size, quality is good - it's also very soft. My son loves it.

reviews.review: Very cute, but definitely needs more stuffing. It is rather floppy all over and the ears do not stick out or up at all. Needs more stuffing.

reviews.name: Customer
reviews.review: We bought this for a child and he was very excited to put the pieces together. They look cute, but there are several pieces missing in the package. As you can see many people also reviewed that the package missed pieces. We are one of those people who received missing pieces package, too. This is a Knock off lego pieces and they have very bad Q.A so no one check on the pieces if they have enough pieces or not. We had to be creative and used some real lego pieces for replacement even though it is not perfect but it works. Also the pieces don't stay tight together and randomly dropped out easily.
